nodes.bodyText:
Thanks for adding unit test coverage for this, can you please also add a couple of happy path scenarios in this file, since we updated the validateConfig() API in CosmosClientBuilder.
It will ensure there is no regression from this change.

unfortunately the happy path scenarios can't be added as unit tests here. because they require a real prod endpoint. the instantiation of the client without a real prod endpoint will fail.
Happy path scenarios are tested elsewhere in our end to end tests when we run prod CI.
Sounds good @moderakh  - can we run the full CI for this PR to make sure everything is good on end to end tests ?
